TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebPartField

summary.span: 定义使用单个字段数据连接两个服务器控件的提供者接口。

span.span: Defines a provider interface for connecting two server controls using a single field of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口设计为与 Web 部件连接一起使用。This interface is designed to be used with Web Parts connections. 在 Web 部件连接中, 位于区域中的两个服务器控件建立连接并共享数据, 其中一个控件充当使用者, 另一个控件充当提供者。In a Web Parts connection, two server controls that reside in a zone establish a connection and share data, with one control acting as the consumer and the other control acting as a provider. 在 Web 部件连接中共享数据的机制是接口实例, 提供程序通过回调方法向使用者提供服务。The mechanism for sharing data in a Web Parts connection is an interface instance, which the provider serves to the consumer by means of a callback method. 若要建立连接, 使用者和提供程序都必须使用相同的接口类型来共享数据。To establish a connection, the consumer and provider must both work with the same interface type for sharing data. 如果使用者不能识别提供程序发送的接口类型, 仍可以通过转换器 ( 对象) 连接控件, 将访问接口实例发送到的类型转换为使用者识别.If the consumer does not recognize the interface type sent by the provider, it is still possible to connect the controls by means of a transformer (a object) that translates the interface instance sent by the provider into a type that the consumer recognizes. 有关连接的详细信息, 请参阅和[Web 部件连接概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100))。For details on connections, see and [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100)). 接口是包含在 Web 部件控件集的提供程序接口, 它是一个标准接口, 用于基于数据字段创建连接。The interface is a provider interface included with the Web Parts control set as a standard interface for creating connections based on a data field. 你还可以创建自定义接口以与 Web 部件连接一起使用, 但在许多数据驱动的 Web 应用程序中, 创建基于公共行 (有关详细信息, 请参阅接口) 的连接很有用 (有关详细信息, 请参阅接口) 或数据源中的字段, 使用接口。You can also create custom interfaces to use with Web Parts connections, but in many data-driven Web applications, it is useful to create connections based on a common row (for details, see the interface), table (for details, see the interface), or field from the data source, using the interface. 在典型连接中, 作为提供者的控件将实现接口, 并向使用者提供一个特殊的回调方法的接口实例。In a typical connection, a control acting as a provider would implement the interface and provide an instance of the interface to consumers in a special callback method. 例如, 提供程序可以为用户信息表中包含 Web 用户的邮政编码数据的字段实现接口。For example, the provider might implement an interface for a field in your user information table that contains a Web user's postal code data. 作为使用者的另一个控件将定义接收接口实例的特殊方法, 然后可以提取邮政编码数据, 并根据邮政编码查找并显示天气信息。Another control acting as a consumer would define a special method to receive the interface instance, and could then extract the postal code data, and look up and display weather information based on the postal code. 接口有两个公开的成员。The interface has two exposed members. 属性返回有关封装在对象中的数据字段的架构信息。 The property returns schema information about the data field encapsulated in a object. 此方法声明一个方法, 当调用回调方法时, 实现程序 (如提供程序控件) 使用该方法检索接口实例的字段数据。The method declares a method that an implementer (such as a provider control) uses to retrieve the interface instance's field data when the callback method is invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用接口在两个控件之间创建静态连接。The following code example demonstrates how to create a static connection between two controls using the interface. 此代码示例包含三个部分:The code example has three parts: - 可使用接口形成连接的两个自定义控件的源代码, 其中一个控件充当提供者, 另一个控件充当使用者。Source code for two custom controls that can form a connection using the interface, with one control acting as the provider, the other acting as the consumer. - 承载控件并以持久性格式声明静态连接的网页。A Web page that hosts the controls and declares the static connection in persistence format. - 示例代码运行时所发生的情况的说明。A description of what happens when the example code runs. 此代码示例的第一部分是两个自定义控件的源代码。The first part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 首先是实现接口的提供程序的代码。First is the code for the provider, which implements the interface. 为简单起见, 在本示例中, 提供程序创建了包含一些数据的表, 而不是连接到数据库。For simplicity in the example, the provider creates a table with some data rather than connecting to a database. `GetConnectionInterface`方法用作提供程序的连接点, 后者是将接口实例返回给使用者的回调方法。The `GetConnectionInterface` method serves as the provider's connection point, the callback method that returns the interface instance to the consumer. 对于使用者, 它会在名`SetConnectionInterface`为的方法中从提供程序中检索接口实例, 该实例`ConnectionConsumer`使用特性进行标记。As for the consumer, it retrieves the interface instance from the provider in its method named `SetConnectionInterface`, which is marked with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute. 检索接口的实例后, 使用者在其`OnPreRender`方法中调用提供程序中方法的实现来检索实际数据。After retrieving the instance of the interface, the consumer, in its `OnPreRender` method, calls the implementation of the method in the provider, to retrieve the actual data. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/CS/IFieldSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/VB/IFieldSample.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是声明静态连接并承载控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that declares the static connection and hosts the controls. 页面顶部附近是`Register`声明 App_Code 目录中包含的源代码的命名空间的指令。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive that declares the namespace of the source code contained in the App_Code directory. 使用``元素声明连接。The connection is declared using an `` element. 自定义使用者和提供程序控件是在`` ``元素内的元素中声明的, 在元素中, 这是必需的, 它们必须位于继承自类的区域内。The custom consumer and provider controls are declared in a `` element within an `` element, which is required for them to be able to connect (they must reside within a zone that inherits from the class). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用者控件显示从指定字段提供的数据, 提供程序通过接口的实例提供该数据。The consumer control displays the data provided from the specified field, which the provider makes available through an instance of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetFieldValue(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.FieldCallback callback) cil managed

param.name: callback
param.span: 一个 委托，包含接收数据的方法的地址。

span.span: A delegate that contains the address of a method that receives the data.

summary.span: 返回字段的值，该字段由接口用作两个 控件之间的连接基础。

span.span: Returns the value of the field that is being used by the interface as the basis of a connection between two controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可检索接口传递的数据字段值。Use this method to retrieve the data field values passed by the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现和使用。The following code example shows the implementation and use of the method. 完整的示例显示在接口的类概述中。The complete example is shown in the class overview for the interface. 提供程序控件实现方法, 并返回数据表中特定字段的值。The provider control implements the method, returning the value of a particular field in the data table. 使用者控件在其 `OnPreRender`方法中调用方法, 以便可以将数据的值写入页面。The consumer control calls the method in its `OnPreRender` method, so that the value of the data can be written to the page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/CS/IFieldSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/VB/IFieldSample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Schema As PropertyDescriptor

summary.span: 获取用于在两个 控件之间共享数据的数据字段的架构信息。

span.span: Gets the schema information for a data field that is used to share data between two controls.

value.span: ，描述该数据字段的架构信息。

span.span: A that describes the schema information for the data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性为接口传递的数据提供属性信息。This property provides property information for the data passed by the interface. 转换器和使用者控件可以查询此属性, 以获取有关提供程序发送的接口实例中包含的字段的类型、内容和其他详细信息的信息。Transformer and consumer controls can query this property to get information about the type, contents, and other details of the field contained in the interface instance sent by a provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现和使用属性。The following code example shows the implementation and use of the property. 完整的示例显示在接口的类概述中。The complete example is shown in the class overview for the interface. 提供程序控件实现属性。The provider control implements the property. 然后, 在其`GetFieldValue`方法中使用属性来检索字段值。Then, in its `GetFieldValue` method, it uses the property to retrieve the field value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/CS/IFieldSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/VB/IFieldSample.vb#2)]
